src:
Pria yang Ancam Penggal Jokowi Hadapi Sidang Perdana Hari Ini
04 Nov 2019, 05:54 by Zunita Putri
Jakarta - Hermawan Susanto yang mengancam memenggal kepala Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) menghadapi sidang perdana hari ini. Hermawan akan disidang dengan agenda pembacaan dakwaan di PN Jakarta Pusat.
Dikutip dari SIPP Pengadilan Negeri Jakarta Pusat, Senin (4/11/2019), Hermawan diagendakan dengan pembacaan dakwaan pukul 13.00 WIB dengan nomor perkara 1116/Pid.B/2019/PN Jkt.Pst. Sejatinya, Hermawan disidang pada Senin (28/10) lalu, namun karena berhalangan hadir, majelis hakim pun menjadwalkan ulang pada hari ini.
Diketahui, Hermawan ditangkap polisi setelah videonya tersebar di media sosial. Dalam video itu, dia mengenakan topi dan mengancam akan memenggal kepala Jokowi.
Video itu direkam saat Hermawan mengikuti demo di depan kantor Bawaslu, Jalan Thamrin, Jakarta Pusat, pada Jumat, 10 Mei 2019. Video tersebut kemudian viral di media sosial.
text:
The Man Threatening Beheaded Jokowi Faces Today's First Trial
Nov 04 2019, 05:54 by Zunita Putri
Jakarta - Hermawan Susanto, who threatened to behead President Joko Widodo (Jokowi), faces his first hearing today. Hermawan will be tried with the agenda of reading the indictment in Central Jakarta District Court.
Quoted from SIPP Central Jakarta District Court, Monday (11/04/2019), Hermawan was scheduled with the reading of the indictment at 13:00 WIB with case number 1116 / Pid.B / 2019 / PN Jkt.Pst. Indeed, Hermawan was tried last Monday (28/10), but due to being unable to attend, the panel of judges also rescheduled today.
It is known, Hermawan was arrested by the police after his video was spread on social media. In the video, he wears a hat and threatens to behead Jokowi.
The video was recorded when Hermawan took part in a demonstration in front of the Bawaslu office, Jalan Thamrin, Central Jakarta, on Friday, May 10, 2019. The video was then viral on social media.
